snippet.title: We made a God Game in 72 hours - Build The Sun devlog intro
snippet.description:
Please let me know what you'd like to hear about in the next videos!

Download the 72hrs version of Build The Sun here: https://punkcake.itch.io/build-the-sun (hold click on the first fire or the game will crash!)
Wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3303480/Build_The_Sun/

Wishlisting means you'll get notified when the game comes out!
It also helps us a lot as it informs Steam that people are interested in this game and that it should maybe show it to even more people! ❤

Chat with us on Discord: https://discord.gg/TkdktuKBgp
Follow us on Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/punkcake.club
Subscribe to this channel: https://www.youtube.com/@PUNKCAKEdelicieux?sub_confirmation=1
